events.name: QuoteRequested
events.description: Initiates the quote request process for a customer.

events.name: QuoteGenerated
events.description: Indicates that a quote has been successfully created.

events.name: QuoteApproved
events.description: Signifies that the customer has approved the generated quote.

events.name: QuoteRejected
events.description: Captures the event of a customer rejecting a quote.

events.name: QuoteExpired
events.description: Indicates that a quote has reached its expiration date without acceptance.

commands.name: RequestQuote
commands.description: Initiates the quote request process for a customer.

commands.name: GenerateQuote
commands.description: Indicates that a quote has been successfully created.

commands.name: ApproveQuote
commands.description: Signifies that the customer has approved the generated quote.

commands.name: RejectQuote
commands.description: Captures the event of a customer rejecting a quote.

commands.name: ExpireQuote
commands.description: Indicates that a quote has reached its expiration date without acceptance.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerRelationshipManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the CRM system for customer data.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration to check product availability during quote generation.
